rule_description_txt: Conservative hybrid model for crypto swing trades; uses wider stops, reduced position size, partial exits, and breakeven stop after partial. Trails remainder with EMA/chandelier and includes time-based exits. May also be applied at trader discretion regardless of triggers.
Conservative crypto swing model for high-risk conditions; designed for extreme volatility, low liquidity, or news-driven moves. Inherits 4C-C logic with stricter entry/exit rules.
Standard hybrid model for crypto swing trades; normal stops, full size, balanced R/R.
Standard equity swing model; aligns with market/sector trend; holds 3–10 trading days; avoid earnings ±2 days unless event trade.
prob_trend_features: EMA20 / EMA50 slope, RSI divergence, volume trend
prob_mktimpl_features:
[ 
    implied_volatility_rank, put_call_open_interest_skew, option_volume_skew,
    term_structure_slope, realized_vs_implied_vol, skew_index
]
